description: This Java test class contains unit tests for JWT utility and authentication filter components within the security package of the project.

classes.name: JwtSecurityTests
classes.description: A JUnit test class that verifies JWT token generation, parsing, and security filter behavior.

methods.name: jwtUtil_generateAndParse_roundTrip
methods.description: Tests that a JWT token can be generated and then parsed to retrieve the subject and expiration.

methods.name: jwtAuthFilter_setsAuthentication_onValidToken
methods.description: Ensures that the security filter sets the authentication context correctly upon receiving a valid token.

methods.name: jwtAuthFilter_ignores_whenInvalidOrMissing
methods.description: Checks that the filter ignores invalid or missing Authorization headers and does not set authentication.
